slides.title: Goal
slides.text:
Every first-order linear differential equation can be transformed into a direct integration problem, but how?

Click "Next" to find out.
Multiply the original equation by an unknown function (the integrating factor)...
Apply the product rule to bridge the gap between equations.
Compare boxed expressions to determine the integrating factor.
Solve the separable equation to find Î¼, the integrating factor.
